short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert long URLs to customizable tinyurl.com/customName

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
!!! IMPORTANT !!!
Restart your browser (quit and re-open) after installing

Helps user convert url of the current page they are on into customizable tinyURL!

e.g:

google.com -> tinyurl.com/customName
okkarmin.github.io -> tinyurl.com/okkarmin
